name: Battleship Board Game
description:
**************** Board Game ************
The objective of the game is to destroy the opposing player's fleet. You can play against the computer, with someone else on the same device or online with game center.

***************** Features ***************
The "Training" mode allows you to play against the computer by choosing the fleet that you want.

The "1 Player" mode allows you to play against the computer.
The difficulty increase progressively with missions.
The rank which has been reached is preserved.

The "2 Players" mode allows you to play with someone on the same device.

The "Online" mode allows you to play with an other player connected on Game Center.
3 points is awarded to the winner.
1 point is awarded to the loser who has finished the game.
If your opponent quit the game or if he is offline before the end of the game then you'll gain 2 additional points.

************** In-App Purchases ***********
